column18: 2 = Drug store/pharmacy (e.g., Walgreens, Rite Aid, Duane Reade)
column19: 3 = Beer, wine, or liquor store (e.g., ABC)
column20: 4 = Grocery store (e.g., small market/deli/produce market) or supermarket (e.g., Stop & Shop, Harris Teeter, Albertson’s)
column21: 5 = Mass merchandiser (e.g., WalMart, Costco, BJ’s, Sam’s Club) or discount store (e.g., Dollar General, Family Dollar)
column22: 6 = Tobacco shop (e.g., Cigarettes Cheaper, cigar shops, hookah bars, e-cigarette shops, or other tobacco shops)
